title: Node infection attribute schema
description: A schema for validating the contact tracing attributes of nodes in a household branching process model

contact_traced.description: Has the node been contact traced?

has_contact_tracing_app.description: Does this node have the contact tracing app?

propagated_contact_tracing.description: Has the node propagated contact tracing?

received_positive_test_result.description: Has the node received a positive test result?

received_result.description: Has the node received any test result?

symptom_onset_time.description: The time taken for symptom onset for this node

testing_delay.description: The delay time before node was tested.

time_of_reporting.description: The time that the node reported symptoms [CHECK].

will_report_infection.description: Will the node report an infection?
